name: Escape Lab: Single Player(Ep1)
description:
A lovely evening takes an evil twist, as you wake up locked up in the lab of the psychopathic Dr. Holmes. Can you escape the lab before you become the next human guinea pig?

* Witness the horrid experiments conducted by Dr. Holmes, and use all your wit to avoid ending up in one of them
* Solve puzzles and escape the lab
* Dark, scary atmosphere with beautiful graphics
* Interact with objects by tapping on them
* It takes 1-2 hours to escape the lab, depends on how quickly you can solve the puzzles

-----
Escape Lab Single Player (SP) is an escape room game for one player.
It is an adaptation of the original "Escape Lab - escape room for 2 players" https://apps.apple.com/app/id1565150724
-----
